import React, {useState} from 'react' import D3Node from '../d3Node/D3Node' import './Input.css' const Input = ({createNode}, {handleConfig}) => { const [name, setName] = useState('') const inputHandler = (event) => { event.preventDefault() createNode(name) } return(
setName(e.target.value)} />
) } export default Input
